title: Video: Charli XCX – Nuclear Seasons
body:
In a bizarre turn of events, I’m starting to feel that **Charli XCX**’s ‘**_Nuclear Seasons_**’ is in fact my song of the year.

It’s assured, empowered and fucking everything I’m looking for in a pop song. Below is a video of her looking super pretty while singing it.

excerpt.full: In a bizarre turn of events, I’m starting to feel that Charli XCX’s ‘Nuclear Seasons’ is in fact my song of the year. It’s assured, empowered and fucking everything I’m looking for in a pop song. Below is a video of her looking super pretty while singing it.
